attributes.action: Allow 16-18 year olds to be included in the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish devolution referendum included 16-18 year olds because of the effect on their future.
attributes.background: The EU referendum excluded a section of the young community who will be affected significantly more by the decision.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/146255
